title: Piz Vadret (Livigno Alps)
text:
Piz Vadret is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the Swiss <a href="Livigno%20Alps">Livigno Alps</a>, located east of <a href="Samedan">Samedan</a> in the canton of <a href="Graub%C3%BCnden">Graubünden</a>. It lies just north of Fuorcla Muragl, between the valleys of Champagna, Muragl and Prüna.
The closest access is from the funicular station at <a href="Muottas%20Muragl">Muottas Muragl</a>.
